name: Instant Labs
headline: Instant builds AI-powered tools to help build your business.
description: Instant Labs started in 2005 by building the fastest domain search engine on the internet: https://instantdomainsearch.com. People have performed over 2.5M searches and purchased 250K domains with our free tool. In 2023, we released Strobe, https://strobe.app, an AI-powered tool to help brands find creators to help them grow.

founders.name: Beau Hartshorne
founders.description:
Beau, a software developer, started Instant in 2005 to help businesses quickly get online. In 2006, he created Snipshot, an early online image editor. Beau then joined Facebook as an early employee, where he played key roles on the growth, photos, and mobile teams.

He's released multiple patents including dynamically cropped images and techniques for handshake-free encrypted communication. Beau also wrote for Smashing Magazine.

founders.name: Dirkjan Ochtman
founders.description:
CTO at https://strobe.app/. 20 years of experience as a software engineer, Rust expert, accomplished open source maintainer. My main area of interest is high-performance, secure implementations of widely spread internet protocols such as TLS, HTTP, EPP, DNS, etc.

See my GitHub profile at https://github.com/djc for more context.

generated_description:
**Instant Labs: Building Businesses with AI**

Instant Labs, founded in 2005 and hailing from Victoria, Canada, is a unique player in the tech scene. The company began its journey with **Instant Domain Search**, recognized as the fastest domain search engine on the internet. It’s impressive—over 2.5 million searches leading to the purchase of about 250,000 domains through their tool, available for free. This kind of traction speaks volumes about their early success and the utility they provide to users.

Fast forward to 2023, and Instant Labs has expanded its offerings with the launch of **Strobe**. This AI-powered platform is tailored specifically for brands, helping them connect with creators essential for growth. It shows their commitment to innovating and adapting in the fast-evolving landscape of business needs and marketing.

Instant Labs is part of **Y Combinator's Batch W22**, underlining its potential and innovation. Currently, they operate with a compact team of one (yes, just one) and are known for their ambitious approach to leveraging AI in business tools. The company is tagged with keywords like ['saas', 'b2b', 'marketing', 'ai'], indicating the sectors they impact.

They're backed by notable investors, including Tiny, Slow, Form, and Y Combinator itself. This kind of support indicates a strong belief in their mission and the value of their products.

You can check them out further on their official website: [Instant Labs](https://instant.ca). If you're in need of efficient business tools powered by AI, they just might have what you’re looking for. 

So, whether you’re a brand looking to grow or just trying to snag the perfect domain, Instant Labs appears ready to help you along the way.
